mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM COM_USER_MEMBER WHERE 1 = 1
AND RET_YN = #{SCH_RET_YN}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM COM_NOTICE_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT TB.* FROM( SELECT T.* , CEILING((RNUM)/#{PAGE_SIZE}) AS PAGE , CAST(#{TOTAL_CNT} - RNUM +1 AS CHAR) AS RNUMUM FROM( SELECT NOTICE_SEQ , BOARD_TYPE , CASE WHEN BOARD_TYPE = '1' THEN '자유게시판' ELSE '찾아주세요' END AS BOARD_TYPE_NM , TITLE , CONTENT , OPEN_YN , CASE WHEN OPEN_YN = 'Y' THEN '게시' ELSE '미게시' END AS OPEN_YN_NM , VIEW_CNT , REG_NICK , DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d')AS REGDATE , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM COM_NOTICE_BOARD ,(SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) STR WHERE 1 = 1 )T )TB WHERE PAGE = #{CURR_PAGE}

SELECT WARRANT_SEQ , DANZI , DONG , HOSU , USER_NM , NICK , HP , WARRANT_YN , CASE WHEN WARRANT_YN = 'Y' THEN '제출완료' ELSE '미제출' END AS WARRANT_YN_NM , AMT_YN , CASE WHEN AMT_YN = 'Y' THEN '납부완료' ELSE '미납' END AS AMT_YN_NM , ADDR , JOHAP_YN , CASE WHEN JOHAP_YN = 'Y' THEN '조합' WHEN JOHAP_YN = 'I' THEN '임대' ELSE '일반분양자' END AS JOHAP_YN_NM , ETC , DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')AS REGDATE , HP2 , USER_NM2 FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE WARRANT_SEQ = #{WARRANT_SEQ}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WARRANT_INFO_HIST( DANZI , DONG , HOSU , USER_NM , NICK , HP , WARRANT_YN , AMT_YN , ADDR , JOHAP_YN , ETC , REGDATE , HP2 , USER_NM2 ) SELECT DANZI , DONG , HOSU , USER_NM , NICK , HP , WARRANT_YN , AMT_YN , ADDR , JOHAP_YN , ETC , NOW() , HP2 , USER_NM2 FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE WARRANT_SEQ = #{WARRANT_SEQ}
mapper.select: SELECT HP , USER_NM , MAIL FROM( SELECT REPLACE(HP, '-', '')AS HP , USER_NM , '' AS MAIL FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE WARRANT_YN = 'Y' AND HP != '' UNION ALL SELECT REPLACE(HP2, '-', '')AS HP , USER_NM2 , '' AS MAIL FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE WARRANT_YN = 'Y' AND HP2 != '' )T WHERE LENGTH(HP) = 11 GROUP BY HP, USER_NM, MAIL ORDER BY USER_NM IS NULL ASC, USER_NM
